0.name: A Path Through the Rolling Fields
desc: "   Plush and flourishing fields of green grass and colorful flowers grow out
to the west from here.  Thick and long lived trees reach towards the sky
all throughout the rolling fields of green.  The fields go out as far as the
eyes can see.  A dusty path around Midgard can be seen directly to the east.

1.name: A Path Through the Rolling Fields
desc: "   The fields of green grass and colorful flowers continues to grow out to
the east and west.  The grass is plush and flourishing, a beautiful sight
to behold.  Thick and mighty trees reach towards the sky all throughout
the rolling fields for green grass.  The fields go out as far as the eyes
can see.  The towering walls of Midgard can see seen the distance to the
east.

2.name: A Path Through the Rolling Fields
desc: "   The fields of green grass and colorful flowers continues to grow out in
every direction.  The grass is plush and flourishing, a beautiful sight
to behold indeed.  Small hills rise out from the fields to the north and
south.  It looks there are paths all along the grassy fields that should be
easy to follow.  Thick and mighty trees reach towards the sky all throughout
the rolling fields of green grass.  The fields go out as far as the eyes can
see.

3.name: A Path Through the Rolling Fields
desc: "   The fields of green grass and colorful flowers continues to grow out in
every direction.  The grass is plush and flourishing, a beautiful sight
to behold indeed.  Small hills rise out from the fields to the north and
south.  It looks there are paths all along the grassy fields that should be
easy to follow.  Thick and mighty trees reach towards the sky all throughout
the rolling fields of green grass.  The fields go out as far as the eyes can
see.

4.name: A Path Through the Rolling Fields
desc: "   The fields of green grass and colorful flowers continues to grow out to
the east and west.  The grass is plush and flourishing, a beautiful sight
to behold.  Thick and mighty trees reach towards the sky all throughout
the rolling fields for green grass.  The fields go out as far as the eyes
can see.

5.name: A Path Through the Rolling Fields
desc: "   The fields of green grass and colorful flowers continues to grow out to
the east and west.  The grass is plush and flourishing, a beautiful sight
to behold.  Thick and mighty trees reach towards the sky all throughout
the rolling fields for green grass.  The fields go out as far as the eyes
can see.

6.name: A Path Through the Rolling Fields
desc: "   The fields of green grass and colorful flowers continues to grow out to
the east and west.  The grass is plush and flourishing, a beautiful sight
to behold.  A small hill rises from the plains a little further to the
northeast.  Thick and mighty trees reach towards the sky all throughout
the rolling fields of green grass.  The largest tree growing in the fields
lies at the end of the path in the distance to the west.  The fields go
out as far as the eyes can see.

7.name: A Path Through the Rolling Fields
desc: "   The fields of green grass and colorful flowers continues to grow out in
every direction.  The grass is plush and flourishing, a beautiful sight
to behold.  A small hill rises out from the fields to the northwest.  It
looks like there is a path along the grassy hill that should be easy to
follow.  Thick and mighty trees reach towards the sky all throughout the
rolling fields of green grass.  The fields go out as far as the eyes can
see.  The largest tree growing in the fields lies at the end of the path
in the distance to the west.

8.name: A Path Through the Rolling Fields
desc: "   The fields of green grass and colorful flowers continues to grow out to
the east and west.  The grass is plush and flourishing, a beautiful sight
to behold.  A small hill rises from the plains a little further to the
north.  There seems to be paths up the grassy hill to the northeast and
to the northwest.  Thick and mighty trees each towards the sky all throughout
the rolling fields of green grass.  The largest tree growing in the fields
lies at the end of the path a short distance to the west.  The tree's shade
is already covering you from the sunlight above.  That thing is huge!  The
fields go out in every direction as far as the eyes can see.

9.name: A Path Through the Rolling Fields
desc: "   The biggest tree you have even seen grows out from the fields a short
distance to the west.  The trunk appears to be at least the width of five
normal people, arms stretched out, touching fingertip to fingertip.  What
an enormous tree!  The fields of green grass and colorful flowers continues
to grow out to the east and west.  The grass is plush and flourishing, a
beautiful sight to behold.  A small hill rises out from the fields to the
northeast.  It looks like there is a path along the grassy hill that should
be easy to follow.

10.name: A Path Through the Rolling Fields
desc: "   Towering high above you, the tree growing from the fields to the west
reaches up towards the sky and seems to touch the heavens themselves.
The tree is gigantic in both length and width.  If you were to hug the
tree, you would probably not cover even one tenth of its circumference.
There appears to be a hole dug into the bottom of the tree at the end
of the path.  It looks like it is big enough to crawl into.  The fields
of green grass and colorful flowers continues to the east.

11.name: Inside a Hollowed Out Tree
desc: "   Hundreds if not thousands of mushrooms are growing inside the gigantic
tree.  You can not walk around without stepping on the top of a mushroom
cap.  The caps vary in sizes from about the size of your hand to the size
of a large platform.  It should be easy to leap from the large mushroom
cap to another large mushroom cap and not crush the smaller mushrooms.
The inside of the tree continues to the west, south and north.  The only
way out appears to be back into the grassy green fields to the east.

12.name: Inside a Hollowed Out Tree
desc: "   Hundreds if not thousands of mushrooms are growing along the floor and
walls of the cavernous insides of the gigantic tree.  You can not walk
around without stepping on the top of a mushroom cap.  The caps vary in
sizes from about the size of your hand to the size of a large platform.
It should be easy to leap from a large mushroom cap to another large
mushroom cap and not crush any of the smaller mushrooms.  The inside of
the tree continues in every direction.  A light can be seen shining in
from outside the tree to the east.

13.name: Inside a Hollowed Out Tree
desc: "   Hundreds if not thousands of mushrooms are growing along the floor and
walls of the cavernous insides of the gigantic tree.  You can not walk
around without stepping on the top of a mushroom cap.  The caps vary in
sizes from about the size of your hand to the size of a large platform.
It should be easy to leap from a large mushroom cap to another large
mushroom cap and not crush any of the smaller mushrooms.  Mushroom caps
lead up like steps to an enormous mushroom cap to the southwest.  What
could be up there?  The inside of the tree continues to the south and
east.  A sparkle of light can be seen beaming in from outside the tree
in the distance to the east.

14.name: Inside a Hollowed Out Tree
desc: "   Hundreds if not thousands of mushrooms are growing along the floor and

It should be easy to leap from a large mushroom cap to another large

the tree continues to the west and south.  A light can be seen shining in

desc: "   Hundreds if not thousands of mushrooms are growing along the floor and

desc: "   Hundreds if not thousands of mushrooms are growing along the floor and

sizes from about the size of your hand to the size of a large platform.
It should be easy to leap from a large mushroom cap to another large
mushroom cap and not crush any of the smaller mushrooms.  Mushroom caps

18.name: Atop an Enormous Mushroom Cap
desc: "   The mushroom cap is easily the length and width of a small house.  You
could probably fit at least fifty normal size people up here.  There is a
throne in the exact middle of the enormous mushroom cap.  The throne is
made of grass, stone and mud.  It was formed with excellent craftsmanship
and almost glimmers with an emerald shine from the light drifting in from
outside the tree.  The view from here looks out over the mushroom forest
that has grown inside the gigantic tree.  The only way down from here
appears to be stepping along the many mushroom caps leading to the main
chamber.

19.name: Inside a Hollowed Out Tree
desc: "   Hundreds if not thousands of mushrooms are growing along the floor and
walls of the cavernous insides of the gigantic tree.  You can not walk
around without stepping on the top of a mushroom cap.  The caps vary in
sizes from about the size of your hand to the size of a large platform.
It should be easy to leap from a large mushroom cap to another large
mushroom cap and not crush any of the smaller mushrooms.  The inside of
the tree continues to the north and east.  A light can be seen shining in
from outside the tree in the distance to the northeast.

20.name: Inside a Hollowed Out Tree
desc: "   Hundreds if not thousands of mushrooms are growing along the floor and
walls of the cavernous insides of the gigantic tree.  You can not walk
around without stepping on the top of a mushroom cap.  The caps vary in
sizes from about the size of your hand to the size of a large platform.
It should be easy to leap from a large mushroom cap to another large
mushroom cap and not crush any of the smaller mushrooms.  The inside of
the tree continues to the north, west and south.  A light can be seen
shining in from outside the tree to the north.

21.name: Inside a Hollowed Out Tree
desc: "   Hundreds if not thousands of mushrooms are growing along the floor and
walls of the cavernous insides of the gigantic tree.  You can not walk
around without stepping on the top of a mushroom cap.  The caps vary in
sizes from about the size of your hand to the size of a large platform.
It should be easy to leap from a large mushroom cap to another large

22.name: A Path Along a Small Hillside
desc: "   The small hillside rises out from the fields of grass and rolls towards
the west and south.  There is a lightly worn path going up and down the
hill.  The fields of green grass and colorful flowers continues to grow
out in every direction.  The grass is plush and flourishing, a beautiful
sight to behold.  Thick and healthy looking trees reach towards the sky
all throughout the rolling fields of green grass.  The tree tops sway
their branches ever so slightly as the wind blows across the field.

23.name: A Path Along a Small Hillside
desc: "   The small hillside rises out from the fields of grass and rolls towards
the north and west.  There is a lightly worn path going up and down the
hill.  The fields of green grass and colorful flowers continues to grow
out in every direction.  The grass is plush and flourishing, a beautiful
sight to behold.  Thick and healthy looking trees reach towards the sky
all throughout the rolling fields of green grass.  The tree tops sway
their branches ever so slightly as the wind blows across the field.

27.name: Around a Gigantic Tree Trunk
desc: "   A large tree grows out from the grassy fields to the west and reaches up
towards the sky.  There are mushrooms growing in the bark of the tree and all
throughout the grass in the surrounding area.  A lightly worn path goes
around the tree to the northwest, southwest and back up the small hillside
to the southeast.

28.name: Around a Gigantic Tree Trunk
desc: "   A large tree grows out from the grassy fields to the west and reaches up
towards the sky.  There are mushrooms growing in the bark of the tree and all
throughout the grass in the surrounding area.  A lightly worn path goes
around the tree to the north and southeast.  The fields of green grass and
colorful flowers continues to grow out in every direction.  The grass is
plush and flourishing, a beautiful sight to behold.  All you want to do is
lay down in the comfortable looking fields and take a nap.

29.name: Around a Gigantic Tree Trunk
desc: "   A large tree grows out from the grassy fields to the northwest and reaches
up towards the sky.  There are mushrooms growing in the bark of the tree and
all throughout the grass in the surrounding area.  A lightly worn path goes

plush and flourishing, a beautiful sight to behold.  All you want to do is
lay down in the comfortable looking fields and take a nap.

30.name: Around a Gigantic Tree Trunk
desc: "   A large tree grows out from the grassy fields to the southwest and reaches
up towards the sky.  There are mushrooms growing in the bark of the tree and
all throughout the grass in the surrounding the area.  The mushrooms cover
the grass in this area completely.  It is difficult to make a step without
crushing one or two mushroom caps.  A lightly worn path goes around the tree
to the west and south.

31.name: A Large Patch of Mushrooms
desc: "   The patch of mushrooms completely covers the grass in this area of the
grassy fields.  The mushrooms are so plentiful that it is difficult to
make a step without crushing one or two mushroom caps.  The mushrooms
seem to be growing out from a large tree in the distance to the southwest.
The fields of green grass and colorful flowers continues to grow out in
every direction beyond the mushroom patch.  The grass is plush and
flourishing, a beautiful sight to behold.

61.name: A Large Patch of Mushrooms
desc: "   The patch of mushrooms completely covers the grass in this area of the
grassy fields.  The mushrooms are so plentiful that it is difficult to
make a step without crushing one or two mushroom caps.  The mushrooms
seem to be growing out from a large tree in the distance to the northeast.
The fields of green grass and colorful flowers continues to grow out in
every direction beyond the mushroom patch.  The grass is plush and
flourishing, a beautiful sight to behold.

62.name: A Path Along a Small Hillside
desc: "   The small hillside rises out from the fields of grass and rolls towards
the northeast and southwest.  There is a lightly worn path going up and
down the hill.  The fields of green grass and colorful flowers continues
to grow out in every direction.  The grass is plush and flourishing, a
beautiful sight to behold.  Thick and healthy looking trees reach towards
the sky all throughout the rolling fields of green grass.  The tree tops
sway their branches ever so slightly as the wind blows across the field.

the sky all throughout the rolling fields of green grass.  The tree tops
sway their branches ever so slightly as the wind blows across the field.

64.name: A Path Along a Small Hillside

66.name: A Path Along a Small Hillside
desc: "   The small hillside rises out from the fields of grass and rolls towards
the west and southeast.  There is a lightly worn path going up and down
the hall.  The fields of green grass and colorful flowers continues to
grow out in every direction.  The grass is plush and flourishing, a
beautiful sigh to behold.  A large patch of mushrooms lies directly to

tree in the distance to the west.

67.name: A Large Patch of Mushrooms
desc: "   The patch of mushrooms completely covers the grass in this area of the

make a step without crushing one or two mushroom caps.  The mushrooms
seem to be growing out from a large tree in the distance to the west.
A small hillside rises out from the grassy plains a little further to

desc: "   The patch of mushrooms completely covers the grass in this area of the

69.name: A Large Patch of Mushrooms
desc: "    A large tree grows out from the grassy fields to the west and reaches up

throughout this patch of grass.  The mushrooms cover the grass in this area
